divs: Sighting DetailsWe were talking outside and we decided to get a book called the The U.F.O.Hunters Handbook. Slow movingobject,constant light source. Went to take picture and it turned up blank eceptfor a blurry cloud with a flash over it. We believe it was some sort of forcefield.Did not lose sight,still watching.
